scripts.prepublish: npm run cover && npm run dist
scripts.cover: npm run lint && istanbul cover --report lcov _mocha -- -R spec
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls ; rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.dist: npm run cjs-min; npm run globals-min; npm run amd-min
scripts.cjs-min: npm run cjs; uglifyjs dist/counting.js > dist/counting.min.js
scripts.globals-min: npm run globals; uglifyjs dist/counting.globals.js > dist/counting.globals.min.js
scripts.amd-min: npm run amd; uglifyjs dist/counting.amd.js > dist/counting.amd.min.js
